thread.title: Mike

author: Mike
title: Mike
text: Nick was awesome Notable, he was the second person I spoke with. The first person was reading rom a script, seemed like she was uncomfortable, had no flexibility and put me to sleep when I was trying to learn about my options. It was bad so I hung up and called again. Nick picked up the phone and greeted me, at that moment I knew I was in good hands and I was right. Nick has game, knows his product, is customer focused and clearly experienced. For no on he is the VERIZON SANTA
